website_summaries.verdict: Simple mirror medicine cabinet, though it's not as well made.
cons: Not as high-quality as some of the other medicine cabinets listed here

customer_reviews.title: Roll The Dice
customer_reviews.text: We got lucky in that our mirror was not shattered upon arrival; however, the screws we received were way too small. In addition, the plastic holes where the screws go in were not large enough. This made the installation a nightmare. Once I got it up (by using my own screws and drilling through the plastic), it turned out well enough to do the job. So, it's up to you prospective buyer. Do you take a chance, roll the dice, and hope to get lucky? Or, do you pass on this one and find another with more consistent, positive reviews? Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Cherisse Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Shattered upon arrival - unusable, unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with shattered mirror. I ordered this cabinet two months ago, but wasn't ready to install it until today. My fault for not verifying it's condition upon arrival, especially since there was no indication on the box that the contents we're fragile.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is a very flimsy cabinet with super sharp edges.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a recessed bathroom cabinet. I was really surprised at the very low quality of the entire cabinet. The construction is very cheap looking plastic. Inside looks so inferior and the beveled edges are lethally sharp on the cabinet mirrored front. I had to install it because it was for a tenant apartment. You can buy a metal one with mirrored interior for just 20 dollars more. So don’t be a cheapskate like me. Get the better one. I know this cabinet will not last so I’ll be looking for a replacement soon. My mother always said, “ You buy cheap, you get cheap”. Believe it
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: My old American Pride cabinet was falling apart after 10 years, and the wall hole was a very specific size that I wasn't interested in modifying, so this unit worked perfectly. Installed in less than 5 minutes. Good price as well, although I don't expect the plastic parts inside the cabinet to last more than 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Betty the Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I looks Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Shelves are light weight no need to worry that they will weigh it down .
customer_reviews.author: Martha Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and installation was simple
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing an outdated & oversized cabinet, and this one actually fit the original framed section. Looks great, and installation was simple. Exactly what we needed without going overboard in price.
customer_reviews.author: GFSELF

customer_reviews.title: it is nicely constructed and fit well into the preexisting hole
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it is nicely constructed and fit well into the preexisting hole. It isn't super decorative but does the job nicely and matches the decor in the tiny bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Quency256

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, I was a little hesitant after reading about them arriving broke in other reviews. They came in excellent condition, fit perfectly where the old ones were. I was surprised for the money how good they are.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Linn

customer_reviews.title: needs better packaging. Replacement came and is perfect
customer_reviews.text: First mirror came broken, needs better packaging. Replacement came and is perfect. Wonderful mirror in difficult to find size for my vintage home.
customer_reviews.author: Sss

customer_reviews.title: Screws are Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I had this 5 stars, but just ordered two more and it seems the screws have been changed. Every screw instantly stripped like made of paper. One cabinet also came with a bade shelf that is warped enough to not be snug.
customer_reviews.author: mike v

customer_reviews.title: fit perfectly in space in our bathroom of a very old house
customer_reviews.text: It was fine, the plastic interior was adequate. I wished the space had been bigger so I could get something classier but it was good enough and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I cannot give zero stars for a rating. We are remodeling the bathroom. Hadn’t taken the mirror/cabinet out of the box yet because we weren’t ready to install it. Took it out this morning. The mirror had been shattered in transit, and the cabinet is made of an incredibly cheap, flimsy plastic. Of course the return window has closed and now we’re stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Messier

customer_reviews.title: Best product I found for a kids bathroom for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Best product I found for a kids bathroom for the price. It installed fairly easily, just measure carefully, make sure no studs, and get a snug fit. The kids now have easy access storage.
customer_reviews.author: St Pat

customer_reviews.title: Quality cabinet for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Quality cabinet for the money 💰! Fit perfectly in my cutout and looks beautiful! Well made and packaged extremely well for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: KWall USA

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new medicine cabinets. They have a beautiful beveled edge so they go with any Décor.
customer_reviews.author: Reta

customer_reviews.title: really neat mirror.
customer_reviews.text: it will only use 2.4 ghz to program on wifi. other than that, pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: mark carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: First one I received was broken. Returned it for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Young

customer_reviews.title: It is not standing up to time
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is rubbing off as times goes by. I'm disappointed because it was bought in 2017
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Falzone-Ross

customer_reviews.title: It looks good on the wall!
customer_reviews.text: I like the mirror alot. Easy to put in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kainulainen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect update to our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: So happy when a product is even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: electra

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking mirror, not hung yet as they are for a remodel we haven’t started yet
customer_reviews.author: Christine Golenbiewski

customer_reviews.title: Works but low quality
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, flimsy. Use your own screws to install. The screws that come with the cabinet are cheap, I broke the heads off 2 out of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Inside is rather flimsy and the mirror is crooked
customer_reviews.text: I installed the inner part and its level in the wall but when I shut the mirror it's off like a half inch.How does one fix that?
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Size was perfect replacement for my broken old medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Size was perfect replacement for my broken old medicine cabinet. I am giving 3 stars as item came with mirror chipped from one corner. Someone responsible for shipment ignored it. I still got it installed because I have handyman working on my house and I did not want him to come back for only one item and charge again.
customer_reviews.author: Syed K Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great in our bathroom. Dimensions are spot on. Shelves are adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the product it was exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recessed Frameless Medicine Cabnet
customer_reviews.text: Great quality very sturdy, three shelves are great. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and quality when compared to those offered by other suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mirror for my bathroom. Easy to install, delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Both mirrors were broken upon opening the box. Refund please?????
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: easily installed and a nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact, easily installed and a nice fit. For an easy install remove mirror from the plastic cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive way to improve an old bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Really simple, attractive solution for an old bathroom with a corner medicine cabinet setup that was rusty and needed replacement. I had to use something I could screw through and not use the pre-set screw mount locations. So, this plastic is thick enough to hold up to the screws for a non-standard installation location. The mirror is simple and good looking with the bevel.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with replacement medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: OK it is plastic, it is also 1/5th the price of some cabinets. It is a standard replacement for in the wall medicine cabinets. Went in perfectly looks great and if you are doing a rental unit like I was the price was perfect. You need the opening size not the mirror size if you are looking to see if it fits. you want it bigger than the opening. I would suggest pre-drilling the screws as you don't want to strip them.
customer_reviews.author: James Wohler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality unit that would normally rate a 5 ~ I purchased two (2) and the other is a 5. But this one has a manufacturer's defect in the glass, it looks like a bubble burst about 1/8'' dead center at the bottom. The problem is that once you see it, every time you look, your eye goes right to that spot ~ basically that makes it's acceptable. I don't know how to communicate with the seller so am just sucking it up....
customer_reviews.author: Sherman, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but it does not close correctly. The bottom is off from the top so it won't close properly and it was installed correctly by a professional.
customer_reviews.author: N. DiBisceglie

customer_reviews.title: Not the highest Quality, But I knew that, and it works.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was good, you can screw into the side or back wall. Gave it four stars because the door swings too far and hits side wall. I Needed to add a few adhesive bumpers to keep it from swinging into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Splinter

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: Actually didn't install the whole cabinet. Bought it to replace the door which I broke painting. Fortunately the new door fit the old cabinet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick65

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! Simple, attractive, low profile design. I bought two even though I only have space for one because I love it 🤦😅 Ooonly wish it was slightly deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This medicine cabinet finished off the bathroom. Mirror is beveled giving it a nice finish. Shelves functional. Priced well.
customer_reviews.author: MommaHamburger

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in a small motorhome
customer_reviews.text: Fits our motorhome mirror that we broke. Just took the old out and put the new in. Fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: I just returned it because the rest of the item looked pretty flimsy -- it's a fragile plastic cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped to me by UPS and when I opened it the mirror was shattered. I just returned it because the rest of the item looked pretty flimsy -- it's a fragile plastic cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom medicine cabinet. Plastic, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror/cabinet is a little flimsy as nearly the entire thing is plastic, but it worked great as a replacement to an old rusted mirror in my second bath. Installation was easy and came with screws.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Great product....terrible packaging.
customer_reviews.text: First one I got was cracked. Got a new one just a couple days later that was perfect. The packaging needs to be better for sure, but all in all I’m a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat this medicine cabinet! Easy to install, very pretty mirror, plastic but useful set up inside. We bought three of them and I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Poor lighting on this.
customer_reviews.text: The lights on this are cold and awful really. I sit the mirror on top of something so it's level with my face and put a light behind it shine on my face. You can see much at all with the weak blue tinted lights that come with this.
customer_reviews.author: patti elhoff

product_meta.title: American Pride 9622WBAR12 – Recessed Frameless Beveled Polished Edge Mirror Medicine Cabinet 16" x 22"
product_meta.description: Size:16" x 22"American Pride 9622WBAR12 – recessed frameless beveled polished edge mirror medicine cabinet 16 inch x 22 inch – there is a simple solution for clearing clutter in your bathroom. Providing storage for the basic bath essentials, this recessed medicine cabinet gets the job done! its quality, polished edge mirror on the door lends a flawless reflection for years to come. Perfect for any home to allow for more space in the bathroom. Recess mount ensures this cabinet will fit snugly into your wall, giving you full functionality with a low profile. Door can be mounted with left or right hand opening for flexible installation options to suit your bathroom shape and size. 2 adjustable white polystyrene shelves and 1 fixed polystyrene shelves provide secure storage for your bath essentials, ensuring they are safe and out of sight for an organized and clean bath or powder room. Injection molded polystyrene body is durable for long life expectancy; slightly rounded internal corners means no dirt build-up in tight seams which makes clean up easy. 17” tri-brite piano hinge allows easy access to your bath necessities. Overall size is 16.875”X 22.25” x double strength (.125) frameless with polished edges with ½” bevel - Rough opening: 14” x 18” x 2.50”. door catch: magnetic catch with riveted striker plate. Unmatched beauty
feature_bullets: 2 adjustable white polystyrene shelves and 1 fixed polystyrene shelves
All hardware is zinc plated (Magnetic catch, screws & hardware pack)
